subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade scored 29 points and had three key blocks in the closing minutes as the Miami Heat overcame a 16-point deficit to post a 101-96 overtime victory against the Nets on Saturday night.
snippet: Dwyane Wade scored 29 points and had three key blocks in the closing minutes as the Miami Heat overcame a 16-point deficit to post a 101-96 overtime victory against the Nets on Saturday night.
